instruction: Compose a blues song with lyrics
output:
Verse 1:
My heart is broken, my baby done left me
My world is spinning, I'm feeling empty
Can't take no more, don't nobody care
Life ain't worth livin', all I do is despair

Chorus:
I'm feeling so low, blue as I can be
Burdens on my shoulder just won't let me be
My life is empty, no more joy around
There's only one thing I can do - sing the blues

Verse 2:
Lost my job, ain't got no money
No place to go, ain't no where to run
Storms of life, made me feel so down
Need some help, nobody's around

Chorus:
I'm feeling so low, blue as I can be
Burdens on my shoulder just won't let me be
My life is empty, no more joy around
There's only one thing I can do - sing the blues

Outro:
My life and love are done, nothing left but blues
Gotta start again, and build myself anew
Life ain't always easy, and life can be so hard
But gotta keep on livin', and singing of the blues!
